name: Side Crunch
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on your back with your arms extended above your head and your legs straight.

2. Lift your shoulders off the ground, engaging your core muscles to support your spine.
3. Bend your right knee at a 90-degree angle, keeping your left leg straight.
4. Slowly lift both shoulders off the ground while keeping your right knee bent, targeting the obliques on both sides of your abdomen.
5. Hold this position for a brief moment, feeling the contraction in your abs.
6. Lower back down to the starting position and repeat with the opposite side.
short_summary: Side crunches are an exercise that primarily works the obliques, targeting the muscles on each side of the abdominal wall.
